Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds immense value to you, as it's worth $15,000 to you personally. Considering its quality and significance, I propose a special introductory offer of $14,000 for this product. This represents an outstanding opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive price. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
